resources.string: The purpose of Job Quest Organizer is to keep yourself organized during your job search process. In the menu, you will see a list of activities you can complete beginning with making a list of your Top Companies, all the way through keeping track of any Applications you have filled out and which you have received Interviews for. You can also set reminders to notify you of application deadlines, interview dates and times, or when to send follow-up emails.

Start by making a list of your top 50 companies. At this point all you need to do is write down names. Once you get your 50, or as close as possible to 50. Then you check whether or not you can obtain a contact for that company, usually by checking on LinkedIn. The next step is to determine the your level of motivation for working at that company. The last step is to check the company website for available positions.

After creating your list of top companies, you want to store information on those companies, any contacts you may have with those companies, whether or not you have applied to any open positions, and if you have received an interview for those applications.
